LogLevel.Default: The default logging level (e.g., Information, Warning, Error)
LogLevel.Microsoft.AspNetCore: Logging level for ASP.NET Core framework

AzureOpenAI.ModelId: The Azure OpenAI model identifier (e.g., gpt-4o)

FoundryAgentService.Endpoint: The endpoint URL for the Foundry Agent Service
FoundryAgentService.AgentId: The unique identifier for the agent

TravelMcpServer.BaseUrl: Base URL for the Travel MCP server
